content: this easy crochet bandana pattern is a quick and simple bandana crochet pattern that uses less than 1 skein and is made with only simple stitches the pattern includes step by step written instructions a photo tutorial and a full video tutorial this easy crochet pattern for a bandana makes a wonderful gift…you might want to keep for yourself about this pattern - this easy crochet bandana pattern works up really quickly - it uses less than 1 skein approx 240 yards and you can use any size 2 fine yarn - the crochet bandana pattern uses only basic stitches - the pattern includes step by step instructions a photo tutorial and a full video tutorial - crochet bandanas make wonderful gifts as the sizing does not need to be exact one size fits all - these types of crochet items sell very well at craft shows
